summary: I BOUGHT A 2007 CHEVROLET EQUINOX IN 2010.  IT HAS A PROBLEM WITH  SERVICE STABILITRAK AND CHECK ENGINE LIGHT ON.  I CALLED SERVICE ADVISOR AT CHEVY DEALERSHIP AND NEEDS TO RUN DIAGNOSTIC TO FIND OUT PROBLEM WITH STABILITRAK.  THE VEHICLE HAS OVER 71,000 MILES, SHOULD BE COVERED WITH DRIVE TRAIN WARRANTY. I WILL NEED TO PAY FOR DIAGNOSTIC FIRST, THEN THE PROBLEM WILL BE COVERED UNDER WARRANTY.  I FEEL THE WARRANTY FOR DRIVE TRAIN SHOULD COVER THE DIAGNOSTIC CHARGE AND PARTS, LABOR.  NOW I CANNOT BRING VEHICLE IN TO SERVICE UNTIL $$ ARE COVERED FOR DIAGNOSTIC CHECK.  THE WARRANTY COVERS USED CARS DRIVE TRAIN.  LET ME KNOW, AND LET THE DEALERSHIP KNOW ABOUT THIS COMPLAINT.    GATEWAY CHEVROLET. 9901 W PAPAGO FWY  AVONDALE, AZ 85323, TELEPHONE 623-932-4389.  *TR
